Potion, rare
This rich stock brewed from the flesh and bones of humanoids is kept sealed in an earthenware jar. When drunk, it removes 2 levels of exhaustion and provides advantage on saving throws against disease, poison, and environmental effects for 8 hours. If drunk by an undead creature, it heals 10 (3d6 + 1) hit points.
